author: Blond Tachikawa
comment: This should be the official app.....not the other one. Great work anyway!!!

author: Noel Dennan
comment: Overall I prefer this app to the official Dublin bus app. App feel and layout is much better & I like the fact you can time a bus so the app notifies you as the bus gets closer to your stop. One thing that lets it down is that unlike the official app it doesn't inform you off last minute route changes.   P.s. it would be great if in later updates the developer could bring Google Assistant integration.

author: Paul Matthews
comment: Great app and works on my Huawei Watch 2. Very handy.

author: Joe Deegan
comment: Thanks for update. Hopefully that will now sort out the recent crashing issue.

author: Annie Holbrook
comment: This app has become the app I cannot do without! It is wonderful!

author: Jon C
comment: Easy to use app along with companion app for trains  to manage my daily commute!

author: David Talan
comment: Much better than the official Dublin bus app

author: David Kinlay
comment: Wondering where one can get shortcut to certain stops now

author: A. Burns
comment: The only way I can imagine this app getting better is if Dublin Bus include real time bus locations to improve bus arrival time data. This thing used to crash. Now for months of recent usage it doesn't, at least for me. The GPS derived nearby stops is easy to find and saves using an excess of shortcuts. It has no useless features. You know the criminal who shoots the TV in RoboCop and says: "I like it!" THIS APP IS LIKE THAT GUN. BUT FOR BUSES. IN DUBLIN. STOP LOOKING AT ME LIKE YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: This is one of my favourite app reviews ever, thanks for making me laugh! :D

title: This is great. Get it.

author: Simon Finnegan
comment: Use this app all the time. Far superior to Dublin Bus' own one.
title: Very useful and very accurate

author: patrick haugh
comment: Love it. Use the train one as well. Much better than the crap that Dublin bus put together 😂

author: Kevin Gaughan
comment: Faster and slicker than official Dublin Bus app. I love being able to quickly swap between arrival time and waiting time.
title: Much better than official app

author: Anthony McGuinness
comment: Consistently brilliant
title: The best Dublin Bus app

author: Kenny Howes
comment: Never let me down, never disappointed

author: Dan corrigan
comment: The best Dublin bus app there is.
Bray South

author: John Egan
comment: Grand
title: Grand

author: Paul Mason
comment: Great!

author: Anthony Ryan
comment: Perfect

author: Fergal Somers
comment: Looks great. Works a treat.
title: Great app

author: Elizabeth Hauroo
comment: Highly recommend.
title: Brilliant app!

author: Julian K
comment: Excellent App
title: Great

author: Dec Garvey
comment: This app has always been superior to Dublin Bus app but developer has never sat on his laurels - latest updates include great features like stop alert alarms which can notify you in advance of live bus arrival time etc. Love it ! Thanks
title: Excellent

author: Julian Carroll
comment: Has never crashed on me (after over a year of use) and it's simple to use. The ads in the free version aren't particularly annoying, but I think it's only fair to pay a small amount for decent software. Good job.

author: Ken O'Neill
comment: Beautiful app! Easily the best looking Irish Android app available today. One of my most used apps. New alarm feature works great for those buses that jump from ETAs of 20 mins to 5 mins within 30 seconds.

author: Francis Shortt
comment: needs stop number lookup back.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi there, stop number lookup is still there. Just use the search function on the stop list and switch your keyboard to number input. Feel free to get in touch on steemcb@gmail.com if you have any other queries. Thanks!

title: user

author: John Carty
comment: Works really well
title: Love it.

author: Mick W
comment: Great app

author: Danilo Prado
comment: Well done to the developer. I already liked before the latest upgrade and now just got better with the shortcut to see the bus route when browsing the bus stop. The bus alert is also a highlight.
title: Better than the official Dublin Bus

author: Sarah Ní Riain
comment: One of the most useful apps on my phone. I love the new "track this bus" feature. No more running to the bus stop! Leisurely strolls all the way!
title: Fantastic

author: Alaa Al-Ramly
comment: Route preview made me buy this app

author: william maddler
comment: Well worth paying to support such a great app! Go for it!
title: Just great!

author: Karol McDonald
comment: Route preview alone makes this app worth buying.
title: Great app

author: John Dunn
comment: I use this app daily, would be lost without it.
title: Great App

author: Seamus Crawley
comment: Great update

author: Seán Moran
comment: Impressive UI, really interactive and layout is amazing. First app I bought! Convinced this is the app to have wen taking the bus. I love the favourites and filtering for your bus you need. I really would like to see more features like a widget you can put on your lock screen, only home screen right now. Also an alarm integrated into the the app warning you if your bus is due/5mins/10mins. There's also no link to rate the app which should be included because it's gr8! Looking forward to it being developed

author: Karen Ní Dhochartaigh
comment: My list of favorite Stops are gone I now have to click into the route to find the stop. As I'm in an area where I have the option of more than one bus this is a pain. Why was this removed. The short cuts to stops on home screen is not what I want as I don't need my screen clogged with a short cut for each stop I use regularly. It's ruined this app for me.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi sorry for the late reply, are you still having issues with the app? Feel free to email me at steemcb@gmail.com and I'll try to sort it for you.

title: Favorite Stops gone

author: Joe O'Hara
comment: Edited previous review. Issues with timeouts appear less frequently - for whatever reason. Appreciate the offer of a refund from the Dev.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi Joe, unfortunately the Dublin Bus realtime data servers don't seem to be able to handle the load sometimes in the mornings and there is little I can do about it. Happy to offer a refund if you're dissatisfied with the app, email steemcb@gmail.com if you'd like to avail of this.

title: Great App - Use every day

author: Karl Paul
comment: Very good app. Quick load time, which is very important when looking for bus info. Like the Google maps integration. I think however, it's time for a facelift and a link to RTPI service messages.

reply.author: Stephen McBride
reply.content: Hi Karl, you can try out a beta version with some design ehancements here: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.nextbus.dublin.pro Feedback most welcome

title: Fast and Efficient

author: Michael Coyle
comment: The ability to add a shortcut icon for my favourite stops, either in a folder or on my main screen sets this app apart from the official DB app.
title: Couldn't live without it
